name: Test Room: Unfinished
description:
You are not supposed to download this game.

It's not finished.

Test Room : Unfinished is a puzzle-sandbox game taking place in an unfinished build from 2001. The game was supposed to be released on the PS1, but got cancelled.

- Discover classic puzzle mechanics and tropes, as well as new ones.

- Try to break the game to discover a big area filled with bonus stuff.

- Get annoyed by a narrator.

WARNING ! You may encounter some bugs. The game is not finished after all. Nothing works anymore.

But if you dislike them, you're welcome to leave a comment describing these bugs and we will try to fix it. Kisses.

DOUBLE WARNING ! The game only works in 1920x1080 resolution ! Also, some Joe's might be lying down, but they can still talk !

Team :

Ewen LE MOAL - Game Design, Code, Music

Jeremy MATIAS, Emilie BOUSQUET - 3D & 2D Assets

Andrea DI MARZIO - Voice Acting / Sprites

Matthieu MODE-YAP - Trailer

Assets from the Asset Store :

Dark Singularity by Pathiral

Apartment Kit by Brick Project Studio

All Sky by rpgwhitelock

Low Poly Brick Houses by Broken Vector

Pixelation Camera by Tristan Weber

Music :

??? - Outro (Couldn't find the artist, if someone know pls tell me)

OXY - Night Club Depression

OXY - Radio Sludge

OXY - Jumping Mania

OXY - I feel like having nostalgia today

OXY - I miss someone, somewhere

Trailer Music - crystallized by swiftslash

Special thanks to Louis GEGOUT-STOVER, Kyllian BONNIER, Denys TAYLOR
